DOC.brief_title: Pilot Acupuncture Improve Quality Life Veterans With TBI PTSD
DOC.detailed_description: Project Background : Acupuncture effective many specific co-morbidities make war-related Trauma Spectrum Disorder TBI PTSD patient , include pain , stress anxiety , insomnia , somatic post-operative pain . Recent study find large effect size ( Cohen 's D .85 1.4 ) . Thus , good reason believe acupuncture induce recovery across number trauma spectrum dysfunction patient TBI PTSD , low cost little risk . Project Objectives : The overall objective application determine efficacy adjunctive acupuncture improve quality life function alleviate co-morbidities associate TBI PTSD service member injure current war . The primary hypothesis study : OIF/OEF veteran screen positive TBI PTSD treat 12 week standard individualize acupuncture method experience improve HRQL ( measure Veteran 's SF-36 ) 6 , 12 24 week follow-up , compare veteran randomly assign standard care alone . Project Methods : This pilot study veteran screen positive TBI PTSD VA healthcare record , submit obtain additional pilot data , confirmation recruitment strategy , information non-participants . Frequency distribution summary statistic demographic baseline variable present intervention group subject combine . Key demographic variable summarize : age , gender , time deployment , number deployment , diagnosis . Key baseline variable : PTSD CAPS score , VSF-36 , ANAM score .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis positive screen test PTSD . Combat veteran Operation Iraqi Freedom Operation Enduring Freedom conflict . Unable travel East Orange VA 12 consecutive week , biweekly treatment . Does speak English . Acupuncture CBT treatment within previous six month .
